```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
CPUE_hist <- function(species_subset){
  windows()
  par(mfrow = c(1,2))
  hist(species_subset$lncatch,
       xlab = "log(catch + 1)",
       main = "Raw Data")
  sum(1 * (species_subset$lncatch == 0)) / nrow(species_subset)
  hist(species_subset$lncatch[species_subset$lncatch > 0],
    xlab = "log(catch + 1)",
    main = "Normalized Data")
}

catch_GAMs <- function(species_subset){
  year_gam <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  pdo_gam <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(PDO),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  npgo_gam <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(NPGO),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  oni_gam <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(ONI),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  pdo_flex <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(lat, lon, by = PDO_mean),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  npgo_flex <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(lat, lon, by = NPGO_mean),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  oni_flex <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) + s(lon, lat) + s(bottom_depth) + s(doy) + s(lat, lon, by = ONI_mean),
                  data = species_subset[species_subset$lncatch > 0,])
  gam_list <- list(year_gam, pdo_gam, npgo_gam, oni_gam, pdo_flex, npgo_flex, oni_flex)
  best_gam <- gam_list[[which.min(sapply(1:length(gam_list),
                                         function(x) min(gam_list[[x]]$aic)))]] # would like to also select by AIC
  return_list <- list(gam_list, best_gam)
} 
```

#### YOY Hake
```{r}
# Base GAM
hake_base <- gam(lncatch ~ factor(year) +
                  s(doy) +
                  s(lat, lon) +
                  s(bottom_depth),
                data = yoy_hake_catch)

gam.check(hake_base)
plot(hake_base)
summary(hake_base)

# Select best GAM
hake_gam <- catch_GAMs(yoy_hake_catch)
summary(hake_gam[[2]])
gam.check(hake_gam[[2]])
plot(hake_gam[[2]])
```
